about_the_game:
Master the fundamentals of the Japanese language with Kana

In this game, you get to learn and practice Hiragana and Katakana which are the syllabaries of the Japanese language.
If you don't know what that means, it's basically the "alphabets" of Japanese.

Key Features:

  • Practice Hiragana and Katakana in the learning hub. It contains a chart and an endless mode that makes memorizing them easier.
  • Compete with the world or your friends and see who's best!
  • Look back on your competitive matches and see which letters you are mistaking the most!

name: Kana

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Start your Japanese learning journey by learning the fundamentals! In Kana, you get to practice Hiragana and Katakana, which are two of the writing systems in Japanese.
